RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 13800. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FROSTY PAWS bumped at the start, shifted three wide after a quarter, closed willingly through the turn and upper stretch to make the lead before the furlong marker and drew clear under mild urging. WILDERZAR was forced out, bumped at the start, trailed down the backstretch, rallied determinedly in the four path through the stretch and finished clear for second. TWELVE MINUS ONE drifted out at the start, saved ground through the turn, shifted out four wide at the top of the stretch and improved position late. FATHER OF LIES pressed the pace three then two wide into the stretch and weakened late. MOBOT failed to menace. LOUIS bumped at the start, made the lead soon thereafter, set the pace along the inside into the stretch, altered course to the three path near the furlong marker then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Minus One
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, saved ground turn, shifted 4 wide, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Wilderzar
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out, bumped start, trailed, rallied 4path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Louis
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, set pace inside, altered 3path 1/8pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Frosty Paws
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked, rallied 3 wide upper stretch, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Mobot
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Father of Lies
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3-2wide, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 50. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 5 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAPPYBDAYMRPREZ pressed the pace along the inside for a half, matched strides into the far turn, was put to right handed urging past the five sixteenths marker, took command entering the stretch, opened a clear lead before the furlong marker and won under strong handling. MY TWO JAKES set a pressured pace two wide for a half, contested the lead through the far turn then was no match for the winner while second best. EMERALD EYES stalked the pace three wide and went evenly. GHOSTLY REVIVAL failed to menace. HAUGHTY PRAISE well placed, failed to respond. LATE DATE was outrun. WELLOILEDCAT was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Welloiledcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Haughty Praise
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Happybdaymrprez
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, dueled to lane, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Late Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, 2 wide, battled to lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Revival
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 5. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DISTORTED LIMITS chased the pace along the inside into the stretch, rallied two wide under right handed urging to make the lead before the furlong marker and drew clear under brisk handling. DUEL FUEL allowed to settle, rallied five wide through the stretch under right handed urging and got up for second. PERFETTO chased the pace between horses two wide and finished determinedly in the four path. GILES raced outside and found his best stride late seven wide. AMERICAN NIGHTMARE chased the lead three wide into the stretch and faded late. MR. TRIPLEDOUBLE was hung six wide into the first turn and never threatened. TEXTPECTATION was always outrun. YOUVESAIDITALL raced five wide into the clubhouse turn and was no threat. UHAVETOBEKITTENME away alertly, sprinted to a long lead soon after the start, set the pace into the stretch then tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Textpectation
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Distorted Limits
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, rallied 2w, took over upper stretch, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfetto
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between horses, 2w, finished determinedly 4path

ENTRY.NAME: American Nightmare
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside trip, best stride late, 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Duel Fuel
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied 5 wide, right handed urging, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Youvesaiditall
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide, first turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Uhavetobekittenme
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, daylight lead top lane, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Tripledouble
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6 wide first turn, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-wi nners Of A Race Since November 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALWAYS LAUGHING never far back, responded with a rapid moved three wide entering the stretch, made the lead near the three sixteenths pole then widened the balance of the trip under left handed urging to win as much the best. CANDY ISLAND set the pace two wide through the clubhouse turn, gave up a narrow lead, prompted the balance of the pace and gamely gained second. DUNVEGAN DOLL allowed to settle, closed gap four wide through the stretch. LIBERTY BELLE pressed the pace along the inside through the first turn, gained a narrow lead, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. CHIQUITA MOSCA unhurried into the stretch, gained ground in the three path through mid stretch then lacked racing room late and leveled off. HAPPY BEE had good early speed three wide and weakened on the second turn. BOURBON BUNS was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Chiquita Mosca
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, gained 3path upper stretch, no room late, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside first turn, took over, set pace upper stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Always Laughing
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, quick move 3 wide top lane, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Dunvegan Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed gap late 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Buns
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 3 wide, weakened far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, pressed 2 wide, gamely gained second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVE MY CHERYL the pace two wide into the stretch, shifted out to the six path, responded under right handed urging to make the lead three wide near the furlong marker and proved best under strong handling. TATTERED HEART vied for the lead along the inside and gamely second best. POLISHED GEM away alertly, set the pace off the rail until mid stretch then was outfinished. CURIOSITY KILLS went evenly. LOIS failed to menace. O K BABY offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then leveled off. SCENIC VIEW chased the early pace three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Polished Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace off rail mid stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Tattered Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, gamely second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, shifted out top lane, rallied 3w, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: James Everatt, Janeane Everatt & Arika Everatt-Meeuse

ENTRY.NAME: O K Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Curiosity Kills
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Lois
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Scenic View
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 102. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 30300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED SINCE MARCH 5 OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claimin g Price $40,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOHN'S ROCK stalked the pace into the far turn, surged to the front three wide in upper stretch under right handed urging then drew off the win as much the best under a brisk hand ride. STAR HAWK allowed to settle, closed willingly four then three wide through the stretch and finished second best. GOOD ON YA chased the leader along the inside into the far turn, shifted two wide, rallied to make the lead briefly past the quarter pole then was outfinished. BREEZY MONEY sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then was used up. DISCLOSURE was outrun. ARMY SCOUT showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Good On Ya
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, rallied 2w, 2nd turn, led between calls, outfinish

ENTRY.NAME: Army Scout
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Breezy Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace top lane, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Star Hawk
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed willingly, 4-3wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: John's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rallied 3 wide top lane, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 5 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VELIKIY had speed from the start five wide, assumed command three wide entering the turn, set the balance of the pace and drew clear under confident handling. CATCHAFALLNSTAR slow early, closed with a rush five wide through the stretch and finished well clear for second. MY DANCING QUEEN pressed the pace two wide and was outfinished. MY D'VALENTINE had good early speed four wide, gave up position on the turn then came on again two wide through deep stretch to finish best of the rest. WICKED WONDER failed to menace. SILVER CANDICE set the early pace along the inside, kept pressure until into the stretch and weakened late. MO RISSA moved up along the inside on the turn then came up empty. TIPARILLO was bumped at the start then failed to reach contention. HOT SUMMER DREAM bore in at the start bumping TIPARILLO and was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Catchafallnstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, closed with a rush 5 wide, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Candice
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: My Dancing Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and BB Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Rissa
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiparillo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Summer Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: My d'Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 4-2wide, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Velikiy
ENTRY.COMMENT: close 5w, assumed command 3 wide, 3/8 pole, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL CUERVO FELIS was forced inward bumping a rival to his inside at the start, had good early speed, rallied three wide to make the lead on the turn, set the balance of the pace and drew off under brisk handling. FINISTERE bore in at the start, was unhurried early, closed determinedly four wide through the stretch and finished well clear for second. SHORTLY pressed the pace along the inside into the stretch then faded. DARK BARON set a pressured pace two wide into the turn, had speed into the stretch then weakened. C C'S CLEAR CREEK was bumped hard at the start then no threat. GREAT REVELATION had good early speed two wide then faded. WILEY T bumped hard at the start and was outrun. RANSAM PAYNTER was in tight along the rail near the five eighths pole then through early.

ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight rail 5/8pole, through early,

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, faded lane

ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 2 wide, faded,

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard start, no threat,

ENTRY.COMMENT: forced in, bumped start, rallied 3 wide turn, drew off,
